narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Applicant is ready for a class C license to exhibit domestic farm animals (alpaca, llama, goats, sheep) and rabbits. 
A check will be mailed to the office for the appropriate license fee. No regulated activity may be conducted until the
fee is processed and a certificate number has been issued. 
Exit interview conducted with applicant at the time of the inspection.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
